title: Fishing for fun, not food: Study takes stock of recreational fishing impacts

title_detail.value: Fishing for fun, not food: Study takes stock of recreational fishing impacts

summary: A new paper by an international team of researchers argues that decision-makers and fishing organizations must recognize the growing role of recreational fishing and the potential pressures it places on fish stocks.

summary_detail.value: A new paper by an international team of researchers argues that decision-makers and fishing organizations must recognize the growing role of recreational fishing and the potential pressures it places on fish stocks.
